Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.message.ServerToClient

Interface StoCMessage

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccessGameConfirmMessage, AssignedSecretObjectiveCardMessage, AssignedStarterCardMessage, ConfirmSelectedSecretObjectiveCardMessage, ConfirmStarterCardSideSelectionMessage, DeckSizeUpdateMessage, DrawCardConfirmationMessage, DrawCardFailedMessage, ErrorMessage, GameStartedMessage, InvalidInboundChatMessage, InvalidSelectedSecretObjectiveCardMessage, InvalidStarterCardSideSelectionMessage, LobbyPlayerListMessage, MatchStatusMessage, MatchWinnersMessage, NegativeResponsePlayerFieldMessage, NewGameConfirmationMessage, OutboundChatMessage, PlaceCardConfirmationMessage, PlaceCardFailedMessage, PlaceCardRollbackMessage, PlayerConnectedMessage, PlayerDisconnectMessage, PlayerGameStatusMessage, PlayerReconnectedMessage, PlayerTurnMessage, PongMessage, ReconnectGameConfirmMessage, ResponsePlayerFieldMessage
public interface StoCMessage extends Serializable
This interface represents a message from the server to the client. It contains a single method to deliver the message to a virtual view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getRecipientNickname()
    Gets the recipient's nickname of the message.
    void
    processMessage(View view)
    Delivers the message to the specified virtual view.
    String
    toString()
    This method provides a string representation of a message object, which can be useful for debugging purposes.

  • Method Details

    • processMessage

      void processMessage(View view)
      Delivers the message to the specified virtual view.
      Parameters:
      view - the view that should be updated with the data contained in the message.

    • getRecipientNickname

      String getRecipientNickname()
      Gets the recipient's nickname of the message. Method needed for submitVirtualViewMessage method in Game controller. GameController needs to know who to send a message to.
      Returns:
      the recipient's nickname of the message.

    • toString

      String toString()
      This method provides a string representation of a message object, which can be useful for debugging purposes. It will be overridden by the classes that implement the StoCMessage interface.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the StoCMessage object.
